document_data.name: Julain De'Spri
document_data.mainbody: '''Julain De'Spri''' was a [[ghost]] noble in [[Undermountain]] in [[1479 DR]].
document_data.History:
In his past, Julain was a magistrate in [[Waterdeep]]. He was buried in Undermountain after his death with his wife [[Amori De'Spri]].

In 1479 DR, the [[vampire]] [[Dayan]] resurrected Julain as a ghost during an experiment. Julain wandered alone inside his tomb.

He was concerned about Amori but urged her to continue to live without him protecting their family.
